name: Burnout Super Car Racing 2018
description:
Burnout super car racing 2018 is an open world racing game with many vehicles. This game allowed you never get bored because you have lots of mission to do. Drive through the relaistic offroad environment and select mission of your own choice. Select vehicle of your own choice to perfom some serious stunts. Be a perfect driver to drive through the narrow roads and reach to destination in the given time. Don't waste the time beacuse time is everything. Avoide crashing your valuable vehicles otherwise you will lose the the power and speed of your car.

Features:

- Realistic vehicles physics
- Realistic drifting physics
- Countless cars : Sports car, SUV, Drifting cars, Offroad vehicles
- A huge open world environment
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Easy to learn and drive
